text.tspan: Real wages and output per production worker in manufacturing,
Unit 17 'The Great Depression, golden age, and global financial crisis’ Section 17.7 'After stagflation: The fruits of a new
policy regime' in The CORE Team, The Economy. Available at https://tinyco.re/17071788 [Figure 17.17]
Note: ‘Production workers’ exclude supervisory employees such as foremen and managers. CC-BY-ND-NC
